content: hairband or bracelet a simple knits design here s a great one to make for kids or for craft bazaars i came up with this when i was looking for quick and easy ideas for things to make for a local animal rescue fundraiser if you can make a slip knot and single_crochet you can make this project these can be worn as pony tail or pig tail holders or as bracelets for small children this is a great way to use up scrap yarn and those novelty yarns in your stash all you need is 5 yards of eyelash or novelty yarn a pony tail elastic band a size h crochet hook and a few minutes of your time materials 4-5 yards eyelash yarn 1 pony tail holder elastic size h 5 mm crochet hook large eye yarn needle key single_crochet = single_crochet instructions make a slip knot with your yarn and place the loop on your crochet hook grab the pony tail elastic and work about 30 single_crochet over it work enough single_crochet to cover the band but not enough to stretch it out of shape cut the yarn pulling the end through the last loop tie the beginning and ending tails together thread both ends in a yarn needle and weave them into the stitches trim off any excess yarn have fun © 2007 vicki mikulak all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only questions simple knits@yahoo com revised 1/13/2014
